span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供集合，其中可以包含物件。This class provides a collection that can contain objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. 範例會建立類別的新執行個體，並使用數種方法，將陳述式加入至集合，傳回其索引，以及新增或移除特定索引處的屬性。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
